quotes.quote: You have to learn to protect yourself through education.
Protecting your treasure means to give your life for it.
Heaven often protects valuable souls charged with great secrets, great ideas, by long shutting them up with their own thoughts.
You protect your being when you love yourself better. That's the secret.
Protect yourself like you would your cubs as a grown woman, you're no one's cub anymore.
The best way to protect your own freedom is to watch everybody else's back.
To protect this earth is to protect the very spirit of life.
Everyone wants to protect their heart, but without pain, one can never have joy.
The great can protect themselves, but the poor and humble require the arm and shield of the law.
Everyone that needs to be protected, should be protected.
When we protect ourselves so we won't feel pain, that protection becomes armor, like armor that imprisons the softness of the heart.
God always protects what He considers to be a blessing for a person.
If you try to protect yourself from pain, it becomes a stone in your heart. But the more you learn to face things, the more likely that stone can become a pearl.
We must protect our most precious resource, our environment, for future generations
You have to protect yourself at all times. What goes around comes around.
Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world.
Protect your children with your own efforts.
We protect virtue so that virtue will protect us.
You must be willing to protect yourself and what you cherish, no matter what the cost.
The best protection for the people is not necessarily to believe everything people tell them.
Protect your spirit, because you are in the place where spirits get eaten.
